Class WorldDominationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • domain.WorldDominationModel

  • public class WorldDominationModel
extends java.util.Observable
    This class represent model class for World Domination View.
    Author:
    Yogesh

      • getAllCoveredContinents

        private java.util.Set<Continent> getAllCoveredContinents(Player player,
                                                         java.util.HashSet<Continent> continentsSet)
        This method return Set of continents occupied by player passed as parameter.
        Parameters:
        player: - player for whom covered continents are to be fetched.
        continentsSet: - Set of all the continents in game map.
        Returns:
        Set containing all the continents which are covered by passed player.

      • getTotalArmies

        private int getTotalArmies(Player player)
        This method calculate all the armies in all the territories owned by passed player.
        Parameters:
        player: - player for which army count is to done.
        Returns:
        an int representing total number of armies.
